members.joinCircumstances: Founded the fake crew to exploit the Straw Hat Pirates' reputation.
Joined the fake crew to impersonate Roronoa Zoro.
Joined the fake crew to impersonate Nami.
Joined the fake crew to impersonate Franky.
Joined the fake crew to impersonate Sogeking/Usopp.
Joined the fake crew to impersonate Sanji.

keyMoments.title: Fake Straw Hat Crew Introduction
keyMoments.description: The Fake Straw Hat Crew is introduced using the real Straw Hats' reputation to intimidate and recruit other pirates on Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how powerful the Straw Hat Pirates' reputation has become that others would impersonate them.

keyMoments.title: Fake Straw Hats Recruit 100 Pirates
keyMoments.description: Using the Straw Hats' feared reputation, the fake crew successfully recruits about 100 men from three different pirate crews.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the extent of the Straw Hat Pirates' notoriety after the Marineford War.

ships.description: The fake crew's ship is not shown in detail in this episode.

jollyRoger.description: Uses the Straw Hat Pirates' jolly roger (skull wearing a straw hat) without authorization
